ygData.subject: Urgent weapon advice needed
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a dilemma :)  Last night I purchased (for 200 plat) an Obsidian Shard (6 Dam/25 delay, Obsidian Shatter effect).  I had thought I had read the the OS
ygData.messageBody:
I have a dilemma :) Last night I purchased (for 200 plat) an Obsidian Shard
(6 Dam/25 delay, Obsidian Shatter effect). I had thought I had read the the
OS effect did 75 damage, but I only proc'd once last night for 30. The
effect is very cool.

Now the dilemma. A rogue offered me a Polished Granite Tomahawk and a
Dragoon Dirk for the Shard. Now personally I am leaning toward keeping the
Shard, but I know I could barter the PGT into either a good bit of plat
(saving for steel plate) or a nice item or two. Any and all advise is
welcome....

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server
